titles.title: Expressing the sense of the House of Representatives regarding politically motivated acts of boycott, divestment from, and sanctions against Israel, and for other purposes.

term.name: Sovereignty, recognition, national governance and status

bill.summary:
Opposes politically motivated acts of boycott, divestment from, and sanctions against Israel.
Calls on the Administration to increase the use of its influence in international organizations and forums to oppose such acts.
Supports state efforts to enact measures that oppose such acts.
Reaffirms support for a negotiated two-state solution to the Israeli-Palestinian conflict.
